item.description:
Website for this image

inter-peura.com

  • Full-size image - 1.3x larger

Size: 1000 × 500 Type: 95KB JPG

This image may be subject to copyright.

Looking for something to do on Friday and help a great cause? Ladies and gnetlemen come  join my friend Courtney and I @ the Linden Place Mansion for the Roaring 20's/Great Gatsby themed fundraiser for the RI Rare Disease Foundation.

A few friends and I went to the Newport Polo Ball and it was truly a great time! We met interesting,friendly, people and we all talked and danced the night away. You just never know who you may meet at one of these events! :-)))

The Rhode Island Rare Disease Foundation would like to invite you to our first annual Care for Rare Silent Auction. This exciting event will be held Friday, September 7th, 2012 at the beautiful Linden Place Mansion in Bristol, Rhode Island from 7 to 11pm. Come tour this historic mansion where scenes from "The Great Gatsby" were filmed. Enjoy great food, jazz music, and the opportunity to bid on some fabulous one of a kind items. Feel free to wear your "Oxford Bags" or your favorite "Flapper Dress"! Hollywood Glamour 20's!! This night is sure to be the "Cat's Meow"! The RI Monthly photographer will be taking pics for the society pages. Therre are many and lots of other extras like champagne for the arriving guests..Google "The Great Gatsby starring Leonardo D. for some great pics of Hollywood 20's Glam outfits! I spoke to the organizer and this event will be worth so much more than the $75 ticket!

COST $75 per ticket LOCATION Linden Place Mansion
500 Hope Street
Bristol, RI
View map » ADDITIONAL INFORMATION For more information: Rhode Island Rare Disease Foundation Telephone: 401-644-7033
Contact name: Candace Simas
Contact email: psimas@cox.net
Website: http://www.rirdf.org/events
item.how_to_find_us: Email me for now, @ day of event we can exchange cell numbers. Either way I have a iphone and receive both.
item.name: Roaring 20's Charity Bash at Linden Mansion!! Dress Hollywood Glam 20's!
